name: part_007
file: tmp_【＃不知火フレア生誕祭 】3D Singing Live！誕生日だし一緒に盛り上がろう！ 【ホロライブ⧸不知火フレア】 [_rJhAn6ZPuU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Flare Shiranui performs 'Yobanashi Deceive' from the Kagerou Project on stage, surrounded by golden lights from the audience.
Flare catches her breath and talks to the audience about the song she just performed and the next, final song.

subtitles.original: 口面に賛成なら笑って
subtitles.english: If you agree with the mouth-service, laugh

subtitles.original: 遠くに遠く離れた君をただ
subtitles.english: Just looking at you, who has gone far, far away,

subtitles.original: 見たことない色に染まった瞳で
subtitles.english: With eyes dyed in a color I've never seen before

subtitles.original: 瞬きの一つもしないまま
subtitles.english: Without even a single blink,

subtitles.original: 大人なんかにはわからない色を見てる
subtitles.english: I'm looking at colors that adults just wouldn't understand

subtitles.original: 明け落ちていく日々の色を鮮やかに閉じ込めて
subtitles.english: Brightly locking away the colors of the days that fade into dawn

subtitles.original: 色褪せぬように
subtitles.english: So they don't fade,

subtitles.original: 思い出してしまわないように
subtitles.english: So I don't accidentally remember them

subtitles.original: 遠回りの帰り道に通り風が吹いて
subtitles.english: On the long way home, a passing breeze blows

subtitles.original: 一人ぼっちのサイレンが響いては消える
subtitles.english: The siren of a lonely person echoes and then disappears

subtitles.original: 乾ききった蝉たちの叶わなかった思いを
subtitles.english: The unfulfilled feelings of the dried-up cicadas

subtitles.original: 終わった夏の正体を僕たちは知らない
subtitles.english: We don't know the true form of the summer that has ended

subtitles.original: 西日の奥から太陽の影が這って行く
subtitles.english: From behind the setting sun, its shadow creeps along

subtitles.original: 暮れなずんで行く今日がもう少して終わるから
subtitles.english: Because today, which is slowly getting dark, will be over in just a bit

subtitles.original: だんだん目が回って夕映え燦々に滲んで
subtitles.english: Gradually my head spins, and the sunset bleeds brilliantly

subtitles.original: どうせだったのに涙が落ちてゆくのは何故
subtitles.english: Even though it was inevitable, why are tears falling?

subtitles.original: 約束を散々ぱらに待って遠くに遠く離れた君はもう
subtitles.english: After waiting so long for a promise, you, who have gone far, far away, are now...

subtitles.original: 僕と同じ色に染まって忘れよう
subtitles.english: Let's forget, having been dyed in the same color as me

subtitles.original: サヨナラの一つもしないまま大人なんかにはわからない色を見ていた
subtitles.english: Without even a single goodbye, I was looking at colors that adults just wouldn't understand

subtitles.original: 今日の日ということも
subtitles.english: And about this day too

subtitles.original: あぁ～！
subtitles.english: Aah~!

subtitles.original: ちょっとかっこよすぎる～
subtitles.english: That was a bit too cool~!

subtitles.original: はい、本日最初で最後のかっこいい曲となっております
subtitles.english: Yes, that was the first and last cool song for today.

subtitles.original: いかがだったでしょうか
subtitles.english: How did you like it?

subtitles.original: いや今回ね、いやこの曲もね、あの、
subtitles.english: Wow, this time, well, this song too, um...

subtitles.original: Suu、パトラが作ってくれた曲でもあるんですけど
subtitles.english: It's also a song that Suu and Patra made for me...

subtitles.original: 演奏ね、してくれたんですけど
subtitles.english: They did the instrumental for me,

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃかっこいいんですよ
subtitles.english: and it's so incredibly cool.

subtitles.original: そう、曲がすごいかっこよくて、
subtitles.english: Yeah, the song is just so cool,

subtitles.original: で、あのこの曲どうしてもかっこよく聞かせたかったので
subtitles.english: and because I really wanted to make this song sound cool,

subtitles.original: ちょっとコーラスだけ事前にちょっと録らせていただいたんですけど
subtitles.english: I actually recorded the chorus in advance,

subtitles.original: どうだったみんな？ちょっともうコーラスめちゃくちゃ難しかった
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone? The chorus was just so difficult!

subtitles.original: でもコーラスが死なないように歌うのも難しかった！
subtitles.english: But singing in a way that didn't drown out the chorus was also hard!

subtitles.original: どう？初めて聴いた人もいるかもしれない。これあのカゲロウプロジェクトさんの曲なんでね
subtitles.english: How was it? Some of you might be hearing it for the first time. It's a song from the Kagerou Project,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひあの元の曲も聴いてほしいなっていう
subtitles.english: so I'd really love for you to listen to the original song as well.

subtitles.original: はい、かっこいい曲、最高だった？
subtitles.english: Yes, a cool song. Was it the best?

subtitles.original: よかった、ありがとう
subtitles.english: I'm glad, thank you.

subtitles.original: やっぱかっこいい曲をかっこよく歌うっていうのは難しいな
subtitles.english: It really is hard to sing a cool song in a cool way.

subtitles.original: うーん、よかった。最高だった、ありがとう
subtitles.english: Hmm, I'm glad. It was the best, thank you.

subtitles.original: えーですね、あの、今回、あの、ご用意させていただいた曲っていうのは、
subtitles.english: And so, um, the songs I've prepared for today...

subtitles.original: 実はちょっと次で最後、次でもう最後なんですよ
subtitles.english: Actually, the next one is the last. The next one is already the last one.

subtitles.original: 早いね、あっという間
subtitles.english: It's fast, isn't it? It went by in a flash.

subtitles.original: なんですけど、あの、待って、まだ帰らないで
subtitles.english: But, um, wait, don't leave yet!

subtitles.original: ちょっと「最後の一曲聴いたからもう帰るわ」みたいな感じにしないで待って
subtitles.english: Don't be like "I've heard the last song, so I'm heading home" — wait!

subtitles.original: ちょっとまだもしかしたら、サプライズで何かあるかもしれない...自分で言ったらサプライズじゃねえわ
subtitles.english: Because there might still be... a surprise of some kind! ...Wait, if I say it myself, it's not a surprise.

subtitles.original: でも！でも！でも最後、最後まで聴いててほしいなって思います
subtitles.english: But! But! But I hope you'll listen until the very end.

subtitles.original: まあちょっと最後の、今回の曲はね、あの、最後の曲、えー今回のこの曲も、
subtitles.english: Well, about the last song this time, um, the last song... this song as well,

subtitles.original: まああの30代ぐらいのお兄ちゃんとか、お姉ちゃんとかに、
subtitles.english: well, to the brothers and sisters in their 30s or so,

subtitles.original: なんかめっちゃ刺さるかもしれない曲をちょっと選びました
subtitles.english: I chose a song that might really hit home for you.

subtitles.original: あの、誕生日に歌いたい曲だったので
subtitles.english: It was a song I really wanted to sing on my birthday,

subtitles.original: ちょっと聴いてもらえますか？
subtitles.english: so, would you mind listening to it?
